info.title: Microsoft Translator V3
info.description: Microsoft Azure Cognitive Services Translator lets you to translate text and documents across multiple languages. You could translate using general & custom models built with custom translator.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid request. Check input parameters.

403.description: The request isn't authorized. Check the details of the error message. This status code often indicates that all free translations provided with a trial subscription have been used up.

408.description: The request couldn't be fulfilled because a resource is missing.

429.description: The server rejected the request because the client has exceeded request limits.

503.description: Service is currently unavailable. Try again later.

post.description: Translate specified source language text into the target language text.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content type like application/json.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API requested by the client. Value must be 3.0.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The source language code (example: 'en'). If the source language code isn't specified, automatic language detection is applied to determine the source language.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The target language code (example: 'fr').

parameters.name: textType
parameters.description: Defines whether the text format being translated is plain text or HTML.

parameters.name: profanityAction
parameters.description: Specifies how profanities should be treated in translations.

parameters.name: profanityMarker
parameters.description: Specifies how profanities should be marked in translations.

parameters.name: includeSentenceLength
parameters.description: Specifies whether to include sentence boundaries for the input text and the translated text.

parameters.name: suggestedFrom
parameters.description: Specifies a fallback language if the language of the input text can't be identified.

parameters.name: fromScript
parameters.description: The name of the script of the input text.

parameters.name: toScript
parameters.description: The name of the script of the translated text.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: A string specifying the category (domain) of the translation. This parameter is used to get translations from a customized system built with Custom Translator.

parameters.name: allowFallback
parameters.description: Specifies that the service is allowed to fall back to a general system when a custom system doesn't exist.

403.description: The request is not authorized. Check the details of the error message. This often indicates that all free translations provided with a trial subscription have been used up.

Language.description: Language code. If none specified, Microsoft Translator will try to auto-detect the document language.

Code.description: Gets or sets the language code.

GlossaryFormatVersion.description: Glossary Format and version for document translation.

FormatVersionCode.description: Gets or sets the file format and version code.

FormatVersionName.description: Gets or sets the file format and version name.

storageType.x-ms-summary: Storage type of the input documents

sourceLanguage.description: Language code. If none is specified, Microsoft Translator will try to auto-detect the document language.

sourceURL.description: The location of the source document(s) which can be a single file or a folder. This location is a URL link from your Azure blob storage.

documentFilterPrefix.description: A case-sensitive prefix string to filter documents in the source path for translation. For example, when using an Azure storage blob Uri, use the prefix to restrict sub folders for translation.

documentFilterSuffix.description: A case-sensitive suffix string to filter documents in the source path for translation. It's most often use for file extensions.

targetCategory.description: A string specifying the category (domain) of the translation. This parameter is used to get translations from a customized system built with Custom Translator.

targetContainerURL.description: The location where the translated documents will be stored. This location is a URL link from your Azure blob storage.

glossaryUrl.description: The location of the glossary documents. This location is a URL link from your Azure blob storage.

target.description: Gets the source of the error. For example, it would be documents or document ID in case of an invalid document.
Gets the source of the error. For example, it would be documents or document id if there was an invalid document.
